website_summaries.verdict: The Gold Edition of the XPS 13 Touch adds faster processing to the excellent build quality, feature set, and gorgeous display of the original. But the higher price and decreased battery life means this high-end ultraportable laptop may not be  for everyone.
cons: Core i7 processor increases cost without a significant jump in performance over i5

customer_reviews.title: Impressive laptop offering excellent value for money.
customer_reviews.text: On receipt the battery charged but would not power the laptop when it was disconnected from the mains. Returned to the supplier a new battery was installed and since then the laptop has given every satisfaction. Of pleasing appearance and well constructed this laptop is highly portable because of its compact size and light weight. Purchased on the basis of an enthusiastic review in 'Which?' I would endorse the magazine's favourable assessment and warmly recommend this laptop to anyone contemplating the purchase of a machine in this price range. I doubt there is any laptop on the market offering better value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Navo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hardware, poor service
customer_reviews.text: As a laptop it is really good. I us some very complex images in CorelDraw and moving them around takes a lot of processing power, this machine handles it without a problem. It deserves 5 stars. The lack of customer service is a worry. The phone number given in the vendor details does not work and they don't answer emails. While I am pleased with the machine I would not use the seller again
customer_reviews.author: Eddie P

customer_reviews.title: I really love the display
customer_reviews.text: I really love the display. It's really gorgeous. The keyboard keys are very good and the track pad smooth. If you are really looking for a light, beautiful and well build laptop I recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Tiago

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great supplier! Very happy with the product at a great price. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Liam Parker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem with my xps when it arrived. After care service from these people was excellent
customer_reviews.author: Ian Cater

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best ultrabook I've ever held. Doe swhat it says it does. Screen in beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: AfricanJedi

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good screen. Generally quiet and doesn't overheat. Major issues with sound and wifi resolved by first update.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Avoid, Dell are still not living up to their promises.
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box it did not work. Unable to load windows, boot drive not found. Helpline was absolutely useless and I cannot even get hold of someone to organise a replacement so it is being sent back for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not very functional.
customer_reviews.text: Can not transfer my phone photos to the lap top. Have to do any alt delete to go to task manager to click off the screen I am on. Not user friendly IMHO. Looks good but I am far more interested in a functional pc that quickly does what I want to do instead of rafting about.
customer_reviews.author: kez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful little thing! It's light, it's gorgeous, has great screen (I got the 1080p) and it is super fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but arrived faulty
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, but arrived faulty. Screen constantly going black and machine becoming unresponsive. No amout of tinkering and updating would help and Dell support were next to useless. In the end, I suspect poor quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Piotr Rusiecki

customer_reviews.title: Ultrabook with enough solid state drive space
customer_reviews.text: The hardware is pretty good although I'm not interested in the touch screen. I can use it as my only PC (as it has 512GB SSD) as long as I have a monitor for home use. It's small enough and light enough to replace the need for a travel laptop (which was an 11" MacBook Air). Windows 8.1 is pretty irritating so I use 'Classic Shell' to give me a Windows 7 interface.
customer_reviews.author: M. M. Otway

customer_reviews.title: Great machine. Only negative is I have the impression ...
customer_reviews.text: Great machine. Only negative is I have the impression the keyboard is a little fragile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dell products are not worth it in the long term.
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well for 2yrs then...the ear audio doesn't work unless I reboot the laptop, with the earphones in. Also, the lit keyboard failed. Also, the wireless now fails to connect to some hubs. ( yes, I read that Dell installed a rubbish network card) Short term profit over long term use seems to be Dell's motive. Shame on Dell Have similar probs with my work Dell......have to cal out a Dell engineer after less than one year!!!
customer_reviews.author: carlos

customer_reviews.title: Common Buzzing problem
customer_reviews.text: There was a buzzing noise that gradually got louder over the course of the 12 months I owned it... I told them about it about a week before the warranty was up... but i didn't follow up a diagnostic check for about 2 weeks and which point they said there is nothing they can do - it is out of warranty. Technically they are covered but it is shocking bad customer service.... plus i have since realized its a common problem for such a high end laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Dell XPS 13 13.3-Inch Laptop (Silver/Black) - (Intel Core i7-6560U, 8 GB, 256 GB, Intel Iris Graphics, BT, QHD InfinityEdge, Touch, Windows 10)
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Intel Core i7New XPS 13 Laptop Erasing borders, starting with the display. The smallest 13.3" (33.8cm) laptop on the planet has the world's first virtually borderless InfinityEdge display - amazing both inside and out. More screen, less to carry: The virtually borderless InfinityEdge display maximizes screen space by squeezing a 13.3" (33.8cm) display in an 11" (28 cm) frame. With a bezel only 5.2 mm thin, weighing in at only 1.22 Kg and measuring a super slim 9-15 mm, the XPS 13 is exceptionally thin and light Stunning, state-of-the-art display Stunning UltraSharp QHD+ resolution (3200x1800): An optional upgrade gives you eye-popping detail with 5.7 million pixels (276 ppi). Easy to share: See content clearly from nearly every angle with the IGZO IPS panel, providing a wide viewing angle of up to 170. Brighten your day: 400 nit brightness is brighter than a typical laptop panel, so you get a great view, even outside. Gorgeous colors: See the brightest bright and the darkest darks with a color gamut of 72% and a contrast ratio of 1000:1. Touch friendly: Tap, swipe and pinch your way around the screen. The touch display lets you interact naturally with your technology. Fully-loaded for enhanced performance The latest performance features: Powerful 6th Gen Intel Core i7 processors and the latest Intel HD graphics offer speed and reliability. Boot and resume in seconds with 256GB SSD, and 8GB of memory. Stay powered longer: Up to 18 hours of battery life standard. Leading-edge connectivity: Thunderbolt 3 multi-use port allows you to charge your laptop, connect to multiple devices (including support for up to two 4K displays) and enjoy data transfers up to 40Gbps, 8 times that of a USB 3.0. Microsoft and Dell have just raised the bar. Again. The best windows ever meets the best Dell ever. The result? A whole new era of power, performance and productivity. Windows 10 give you all the features you know from the world's most popular operating system, plus great improvements you'll love. Enhance all you do with the new Windows 10 features: Here to help: Easily interact with your own personal digital assistant: Cortana. Using Cortana with a Dell PC equipped with Waves MaxxAudio Pro gives you a natural voice interaction experience. Start it up: You'll feel like an expert from the get-go since your Windows Start menu is back in an expanded form. Plus, all your pinned applications will carry over so your experience is familiar, productive and better than ever. Stay unplugged: Stay untethered for even longer: All Windows 10 devices now have Battery Saver to automatically conserve power so you can get more done for longer. Improved usability Pinch, zoom and click with precision The precision touch pad prevents jumping and floating cursors, while Accidental Activation Prevention puts a stop to unintentional clicks when your palm hits the touch pad. See what you've been missing A standard backlit keyboard illuminates your keys so you can stay productive in low-light or no-light rooms. Artfully constructed from premium materials Maximum durability: The XPS 13 is cut with precision from a single block of aluminum for a sturdy, durable chassis in a beautiful design. The Corning Gorilla Glass NBT QHD+ display is up to 10 times more scratch resistant than soda lime glass. Cool under pressure: The palm rest is made from carbon fiber. It's strong and thin like aluminum, but lighter and cooler to the touch. The Greenest XPS laptops ever Power efficient: XPS 13 is ENERGY STAR certified Smarter materials: Free of materials like cadmium, lead, mercury and some phthalates, it's also EPEAT Gold registered5 and BFR/PVC-free6. Recycle-friendly: 90% of the laptop's parts can be easily recycled or reused, and the bamboo packaging trays are 100% recyclable XPS 13 Laptop Features • Intel Core i5-6200U Processor • 8GB RAM • 256GB SSD • 13.3" QHD+ (3200 x 1800) InfinityEdge Touch display • Windows 10 Home • HDMI Port • USB 3.1 (2) • Media Card Reader (SD, SDHC, SDXC) • Thunderbolt 3 supporting: Power in/charging, PowerShare, Thunderbolt 3 • Up to 8 hours of battery life • Full size, backlit chiclet keyboard; 1.3mm travel • Precision touchpad, seamless glass integrated button • Widescreen HD (720p) webcam with dual array digital microphones • 18 Hours Battery

BOX CONTAINS
1 x Dell XPS 13
45 W Adapter Plus Uk Power Cable
